DOC.HEADLINE: NATION IN BRIEF ; MASSACHUSETTS ; LEADER OF SINN FEIN STARTS TOUR OF U.S.
DOC.TEXT: Gerry Adams , leader of the political wing of the_Irish Republican Army , began a nine-city U.S. tour in Boston , the most Irish of American cities . The Sinn Fein leader appealed_to British Prime_Minister John Major to work for peace in the wake of the cease-fire declared by the IRA in its guerrilla war against British rule of Northern Ireland.Adams will tour the United States for two weeks , primarily seeking to raise support among Irish Americans . About 100 cheering Sinn Fein supporters greeted Adams at the Boston airport where he was met by Sen . Edward M . Kennedy ( D-Mass. ) . The trip is Adams ' second to the United States this year and the first since the IRA called the cease-fire Aug . 31 .
